meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>scooter</radical> and your <radical>car</radical> is what you always <kanji>take along</kanji> with you. Make sure they're <kanji>connect</kanji>ed well so you don't lose them!
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>take along</kanji> your scooter and your car. Anything else, you can do a <reading>ren</reading>tal (れん) for!
